title: Ukraine Dismantles EU Crypto Fraud Scheme, Arrests 11 Suspects - Odessa Journal
summary_full: Ukraine Dismantles EU Crypto Fraud Scheme, Arrests 11 Suspects  Odessa JournalCall center administrators involved in cryptocurrency investments have been detained  logos-pres.mdIn Dnipro, fraudsters profited from deceiving EU citizens with crypto through call centers; elite cars and millions in foreign currency were found – Prosecutor General  Українські Національні Новини (УНН)Moldovan and Romanian call centers linked to financial fraud; organizers detained in a Eurojust-led operation  Radio Moldova
